content:
What a great idea! Family game nights are an excellent way to spend quality time together and create wonderful memories. I'd be happy to suggest some online games that are easy to learn and play, perfect for a fun family game night:

**1. Jackbox Games**:
	* A collection of party games that can be played by multiple people using their phones as controllers.
	* Games include quizzes, drawing challenges, and word games.
	* Easy to learn, and you can play with up to 10 players.

**2. Among Us**:
	* A popular online multiplayer game where players work together to fix a spaceship, but some players are "impostors" trying to sabotage the mission.
	* Easy to learn, and games can be played with 4-10 players.

**3. Scattergories**:
	* A creative-thinking category-based game where players have to come up with unique answers that fit certain criteria.
	* Can be played with 2-10 players, and games typically last around 30 minutes.

**4. Codenames**:
	* A word-guessing game where players try to identify words based on one-word clues given by their teammate.
	* Easy to learn, and games can be played with 4-8 players.

**5. Tabletop Simulator**:
	* A digital version of popular board games, including classics like Chess, Checkers, and Mancala.
	* Can be played with 2-8 players, and games can be saved and resumed later.

**6. Kahoot**:
	* A game-based learning platform that offers a wide range of quizzes and games on various topics.
	* Can be played with 2-10 players, and games can be created and shared easily.

**7. QuizUp**:
	* A mobile app that offers a wide range of quizzes on various topics, including history, music, sports, and more.
	* Can be played with 2-10 players, and games can be played in real-time or asynchronously.

These games are all easy to learn, fun to play, and can be enjoyed by people of all ages. You can choose one or a few games to play during your family game night, depending on your family's interests and preferences.

Remember to test the games beforehand to ensure they work smoothly on your devices and internet connection. Have fun!
